Articles.Content:
Dialogue from mission control or your ship ex("Houston we have a problem", "Solid fuel boosters are stable", we have liftoff")

A little tv in the corner of your screen to show that your launch and mission is being aired on kerbal tv

This is idea is a little far fetched for a game like this but the ability to create life on a planet, have a family, have kids, build a home, build a town etc

Some people such as myself cant figure out how to get to another planet, so a optional easier way to get there would be nice

The ability to customize your galaxy before you create your world (how many planets, are they livable, how big, etc)

1st person view, and the ability to walk inside your space shuttle (if its big enough of course) and you can strap yourself in open doors etc

thats all i have for now

I dont want "dialogue" but some gibberish from KSC to the ships in space would be awesome. thats why I dont play without the chatterer mod. really alot of KSP's audio could use some love.

everything else I must disagree on, especially the first person movement. the variables are too great with a creativity based game like KSP. how would they account for a design like this?
